0.text: Innate: Sivir's basic attacks and ability hits against enemy  champions grant her  55 − 75 (based on level) bonus movement speed decaying over 1.5 seconds, refreshing on subsequent hits.
0.html: Innate: Sivir's basic attacks and ability hits against enemy champions grant her  55 − 75 (based on level) bonus movement speed decaying over 1.5 seconds, refreshing on subsequent hits.
markedPassages: champions
55 − 75 (based on level) bonus movement speed
55 − 75 (based on level) bonus movement speed

2.text: CAST TIME: 0.25 − 0.1 (BASED ON BONUS ATTACK SPEED)

0.text: Active: Sivir hurls her crossblade in the target direction, dealing physical damage to enemies within its path, increased by 0% − 50% (based on critical strike chance).
0.html: Active: Sivir hurls her crossblade in the target direction, dealing physical damage to enemies within its path, increased by 0% − 50% (based on critical strike chance).

1.text: Boomerang Blade's damage is reduced by 0% − 60% (based on non-champions hit). Upon reaching maximum range, the crossblade returns to her, resetting the damage modifier and dealing the same damage to enemies on its way back.
1.html: Boomerang Blade's damage is reduced by 0% − 60% (based on non-champions hit). Upon reaching maximum range, the crossblade returns to her, resetting the damage modifier and dealing the same damage to enemies on its way back.

2.text: Enemies can be hit only once per pass.
2.html: Enemies can be hit only once per pass.
possibleConcerningAbilities: Enemies can be hit only once per pass.

0.text: Active: Sivir empowers her crossblade for the next 4 seconds, gaining  bonus attack speed and causing her basic attacks to bounce to additional surrounding enemies, dealing them physical damage. If the triggering attack  critically strikes, the bounces will do so as well. Ricochet deals 65% damage against  minions and executes them if they would be left below  15 health.
0.html: Active: Sivir empowers her crossblade for the next 4 seconds, gaining  bonus attack speed and causing her basic attacks to bounce to additional surrounding enemies, dealing them physical damage. If the triggering attack critically strikes, the bounces will do so as well. Ricochet deals 65% damage against minions and executes them if they would be left below  15 health.
markedPassages: bonus attack speed
critically strikes
minions
15 health

1.text: Bounces occur only up to 8 times and can target each enemy up to one additional time per empowered attack. They prioritize the nearest new target, then the nearest target if no new targets are available.
1.html: Bounces occur only up to 8 times and can target each enemy up to one additional time per empowered attack. They prioritize the nearest new target, then the nearest target if no new targets are available.

2.text: Ricochet  resets Sivir's basic attack timer. The target does not have to be  visible to be bounced to.
2.html: Ricochet resets Sivir's basic attack timer. The target does not have to be visible to be bounced to.
markedPassages: resets
visible
possibleConcerningAbilities: Ricochet  resets Sivir's basic attack timer. The target does not have to be  visible to be bounced to.

0.text: Active: Sivir gains a  spell shield for 1.5 seconds. Upon successfully blocking a hostile effect, she  heals herself and activates  Fleet of Foot after 0.25 seconds.
0.html: Active: Sivir gains a spell shield for 1.5 seconds. Upon successfully blocking a hostile effect, she heals herself and activates Fleet of Foot after 0.25 seconds.
markedPassages: spell shield
heals
Fleet of Foot

0.text: Active: Sivir gains On the Hunt for a duration and grants it to nearby allied champions for the remaining duration.
0.html: Active: Sivir gains On the Hunt for a duration and grants it to nearby allied champions for the remaining duration.

1.text: On the Hunt: Gain  bonus movement speed.
1.html: On the Hunt: Gain  bonus movement speed.
markedPassages: bonus movement speed

2.text: While active, Sivir's basic attacks on-attack reduce her basic abilities'  current cooldowns by 0.5 seconds each.
2.html: While active, Sivir's basic attacks on-attack reduce her basic abilities'  current cooldowns by 0.5 seconds each.
markedPassages: current cooldowns

3.text: On the Hunt's duration is refreshed whenever Sivir scores a  takedown against an enemy  champion within 3 seconds of damaging them.
3.html: On the Hunt's duration is refreshed whenever Sivir scores a takedown against an enemy champion within 3 seconds of damaging them.

champion
